annotations.description: This drink was created by Sasha Petraske of Milk & Honey in the early 2000's. It was adapted from a drink from Harry Craddock's Savoy Cocktail Book published...
annotations.title: The Applejack Cocktail

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Applejack
.5oz (15ml) Apple Cider
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup

Shake and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nygX5PyFnI8
title: Applejack Cocktail
